refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function returns the media type in effect for the result of the xslt() (XSL-T) transformation , based on xsl:output "media-type" and "method" attributes of the XSL-T style-sheet applied. It accepts an entity (potentially resulting from using xslt()) as a argument and will return a string containing the media-type.

refsect2.title: xml_entity
refsect2.para: An XML entity such as that returned by the xslt() function.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: If xsl:output "media-type" specified in XSL-T sheet it's value will be returned. If no "media-type" is specified, the valid results dependent on the <xsl:output "method" attribute are:

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: This function can generate the following errors:
22023 SR003 Function xml_tree_doc_media_type needs an XML entity as argument 1, not an arg of type <type_name> (<type>)
